summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 HOLIDAY RAMBLER AMBASSADOR. THE CONTACT STATED THAT AFTER INSPECTING THE WIRING, HE DISCOVERED THAT THE 15 AMP MELTED THE ELECTRICAL BOX.  THE CONTACT MENTIONED THAT HE DISCONNECTED THE HOT WIRES TO PREVENT A FIRE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 6,350. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.  UPDATED 02/19/16*LJ  THE CONSUMER STATED A SUB-CONTRACTOR MIS-WIRED A CONTROL MODULE. UPDATED 03/31/16.*JB
